description:
A time tracker and timesheet app that lets you track work hours across projects.


- (UI Improvement) 'Today' and 'This week/month total' now refresh automatically while the timer runs.
- (Fix) Resolved the issue that prevented Project Managers from creating tasks in public projects.
- (Fix) Fixed the excessive display of the description dropdown popup.
- (Fix) Eliminated the 'This shortcut is already taken' error that appeared when setting a shortcut value.
